name: Lightweight X Base Layer Crewneck - Men's

features: Slim fit sits close to the body, with room for the garment to move with you
Lightweight 100 Living Lining® provides consistent temperature regulation without adding bulk or weight
Four-way stretch fabrication for enhanced mobility
Sustainable odor control provides durable freshness by eliminating body odor, environmental odors, and accumulated fabric odors without limiting breathability
Chafe-free softlock seams for added comfort
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
